title: IoT Federated Blockchain Learning at the Edge. (arXiv:2304.03006v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: IoT devices are sorely underutilized in the medical field, especially within machine learning for medicine, yet they offer unrivaled benefits. IoT devices are low-cost, energy-efficient, small and intelligent devices. In this paper, we propose a distributed federated learning framework for IoT devices, more specifically for IoMT (Internet of Medical Things), using blockchain to allow for a decentralized scheme improving privacy and efficiency over a centralized system; this allows us to move from the cloud-based architectures, that are prevalent, to the edge. The system is designed for three paradigms: 1) Training neural networks on IoT devices to allow for collaborative training of a shared model whilst decoupling the learning from the dataset to ensure privacy. translated_title: 边缘物联网联邦区块链学习技术
translated_abstract: 物联网设备在医学领域特别是医疗机器学习方面的利用远远不够，但它们具有无可比拟的优势。本文提出了一种分布式联邦学习框架，用于IoMT（医疗物联网）的IoT设备，利用区块链实现分散式方案，提高隐私性和效率，从而从主流的基于云的架构向边缘移动。
tldr: 本文提出了一种边缘计算的联邦学习框架，使用区块链实现分散式方案，从而提高隐私性和效率，可以在不泄露数据隐私的前提下，训练出更加准确、全面的医疗机器学习模型。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a distributed federated learning framework for IoMT devices using blockchain to achieve a decentralized scheme with improved privacy and efficiency, allowing for training of more accurate and comprehensive medical machine learning models without compromising data privacy.
